headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Valuation Check After US$1b Pentagon Investment And Planned Missile Solutions IPO
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) is in focus after the Pentagon agreed to invest US$1b in its solid rocket motors business, and the company outlined plans to spin off its Missile Solutions segment via an IPO in 2026. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies. The recent Pentagon investment and planned Missile Solutions IPO have coincided with strong momentum in L3Harris, with an 18.98% 1 month share price return and a 65.34% 1 year total shareholder return indicating interest has been...
